explicit_statement: Phase 3 FORENSICS ONLY. No code changes authorized. All findings documented for CEO review.

executive_summary.headline: Execution blocked by two independent issues: (1) LIDS confidence field mismatch bug, (2) Stale needles (4-5 days old vs 12h threshold)

task_3_1_schema_alignment.finding: All 5 schema mismatches fixed in Phase 2. Daemon runs cleanly with zero schema errors.

task_3_2_lids_forensics.finding: LIDS confidence=0.00 caused by field name mismatch. Code looks for 'confidence' but SELECT provides 'sitc_confidence_level'. All 8 signals have sitc_confidence_level='HIGH' (maps to 0.85) but code defaults to 0.0.

task_3_3_freshness_reconciliation.finding: All golden needles are 99-128 hours old. LIDS threshold is 12 hours. Even if confidence bug is fixed, freshness gate would block all signals.
task_3_3_freshness_reconciliation.root_cause: FINN hunt session process not running since Jan 5 - no new needles being generated

issue_1.description: Line 1698 looks for 'confidence' or 'belief_confidence', but SELECT query provides 'sitc_confidence_level'
issue_1.impact: 100% of valid signals blocked with confidence=0.00

issue_2.description: No new golden needles generated since Jan 8 (4.5 days). All needles 99-128h old, threshold is 12h.
issue_2.impact: Even if confidence bug fixed, freshness gate blocks all signals

issue_3.description: BTC/ETH/SOL prices 24 hours stale, triggering WARNING status
issue_3.impact: New needles would use stale price witnesses

phase_3_directive_compliance.justify_confidence_nonzero: CANNOT_JUSTIFY - code bug prevents valid confidence from being read

decision_1.impact: Enables confidence gate to pass for HIGH-confidence signals (0.85 >= 0.70 threshold)
decision_1.risk: Minimal - still blocked by freshness gate until new needles generated

decision_2.item: Investigate and restart FINN hunt session process
decision_2.impact: Generates fresh golden needles to satisfy 12h freshness requirement
decision_2.risk: Unknown - requires understanding why process stopped

decision_3.item: Authorize paper trading test once both blockers resolved
decision_3.risk: Paper mode only - no capital exposure

attestation.statement: Phase 3 forensics complete. Two independent execution blockers identified: (1) LIDS confidence field mismatch bug causing all signals to show 0.00 confidence, (2) all golden needles 4-5 days stale vs 12h threshold due to FINN hunt session process not running. No code changes made per directive. Evidence files created for CEO review.
